message.body: see...
Ah
So what are you up to today, other than harassing poor unsuspecting women on the internet?
Im about to go meet a friend to play tennis/bball in 20 min or so
Are you combining the sports? Because that would be entertaining, and I'd appreciate pictures/video.
Basketball with a tennis ball v. tennis with a basketball...
Tennis with hoops.
I'm not sure which combination would be more entertaining
hmmm
I hadn't considered those options
I hope you're rectifying that oversight.
no, I think we will just stick to the traditional sports
though I would not be apposed
so, anyways...
what was I saying?
Previously, on FB, you were questioning when to meet up with people from the internet
ah, yeah 3 months is probably too long
Meh
Depends on where you 'meet' online and what the purpose is
Which is more or less why I've given up on online dating sites
yeah I think it took us a while to actually meet in person
but you kinda disappeared from what I remember
It happens.
and that was kind of the case with jersey girl as well
we would email, then not hear from the other for a while
then, SURPRISE! it's an email
In your case, because you were spending all of your time trying to woe every other woman in the Mid-Atlantic region ^_^
I would have to re-read the last couple to remember what the fuck we were talking about
but they were magical...
You're ridiculous, kid.
the problem is, you build this relationship based on sexy ass emails
it's kinda hard to live up to it in real life
Yeah, I don't know about that.
My first crazy-in-love relationship started online
and I don't mean there was 'sex' in the emails
emails/IMing/video chating for like 4-5 months
There was no let down when we met in person

yeah, I mean there wasn't any let down when we met either, except she looked slightly different than her pictures but no biggie, hell in a way it was a relief since she looked really hot in her pictures
Like out-of-my-league hot
Do you go out with anyone that you met in the real world?
Or that you met online, but not on a "meeting people" website?
Yeah sure
